version_description:
- Fixed the reverse bug in Snow
- Fixed losing levels after Tank Battles
- Fixed exploit of choosing cars you do not own
- Fixed scoreboard staying on screen in Tank Battles
- Other minor bug fixes

- Fixed the reverse bug in Snow
- Fixed losing levels after Tank Battles
- Fixed exploit of choosing cars you do not own
- Fixed scoreboard staying on screen in Tank Battles
- Other minor bug fixes

We've added some Easter eggs for you to find in each level, they are different every month!

Improved performance and fixed some bugs

We've added some Easter eggs for you to find in each level, they are different every month!

Improved performance and fixed some bugs

- The game is now compatible on all recent iOS devices
- Playerlist UI will move if you have a notch on the screen.
- Added new free cash rewards
- Improved the performance

- Added new free cash rewards
- Improved the performance

- Playerlist will move if you have a notch on the screen.
- Added new "free cash" rewards
- Higher resolution car textures
- Improved the performance
- Fixed tutorial text being hidde

- The game is now compatible on all recent devices
- Playerlist will move if you have a notch on the screen.
- Added new "free cash" rewards
- Higher resolution car textures
- Improved the performance
- Fixed tutorial text being hidde

- Fixed playername incorrectly changing to "Lerpz"
- Improved graphics on iPhone 11 and equivalent devices
- Corrected "deathzone" in tank battles
- Moved control buttons a bit from the edges
- No more ads during shady dealer race

- Fixed: Stop privacy policy reappearing

Tank battle now max level 999 instead of 99
